thread.title: Sweet Stay in Chelsea
thread.title_full: Sweet Stay in Chelsea - Review of Innside New York Nomad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: I5617FDrebeccar
title: Sweet Stay in Chelsea
text: From the street side patio with clever slatted walls to delineate the space to the well-appointed rooms with free soft drinks, water and juice, Innside is a superb option in the bustling Chelsea neighborhood. The staff is friendly and attentive. The restaurant has a little something for everyone in your party. In the workout room, you can take a virtual run in California or Europe. If you like Indigo and Eventi, give Innside a try.
